channel.title: [REQ]Item Pickup[REQ]
channel.description:
Does anyone have a effing clue how to make it so you dont have to click twice to pick up an item..
I myself have been trying to figure it out for a few days now, will no success.
If anyone has any ideas they would like to bounce off me, please do and Ill try them Big Grin
NOTE: Anyone that comes up with it, will get full recogniztion and admin status on my server :$[br][size=1]Posted at: September 28, 2006, 04:43:40 PM[/size][hr]Wow, can no one figure this out :@
Shit, oh well thanks guys

item.title: [REQ]Item Pickup[REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

It’s server side I believe… because all the client does is display the item, it’s up to the server to decide where that item goes

Read full topic

i’m pretty sure this is a mopar glitch, you’d have to edit moparscape’s coding to fix it

item.title: [REQ]Item Pickup[REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

			} else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
					if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such item.");
					}

Just put that with the others

Read full topic
